frostdrawer.name: Frostdrawer
frostdrawer.desc: Grants you the ability to command Ice as a Frostdrawer.

adept_frostdrawer.name: Adept Frostdrawer
adept_frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Frostdrawer mantras.

cold_front.name: Cold Front
cold_front.desc: Your Vent is imbued with glacial frost.

expert_frostdrawer.name: Expert Frostdrawer
expert_frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Frostdrawer mantras.

master_frostdrawer.name: Master Frostdrawer
master_frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Frostdrawer mantras.
